content: Zhipeng Wang - Research Explorer The University of Manchester Zhipeng Wang Dr Lecturer in Cyber Security, Systems and Software Security https://orcid.org/0000-0003-1089-1583 Accepting PhD Students Personal profile OverviewI am a Lecturer (equivalent to an Assistant Professor) in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Manchester. Previously, I finished my role as a Postdoctoral Research Associate at Imperial College London, where I also completed my PhD. My research interests lie in the domain of privacy and security within decentralized and distributed computing systems, with a particular focus on blockchain and decentralized AI systems, as well as the underlying cryptographic primitives and protocols that support and secure them. Currently, I am exploring the following topics: Blockchain: privacy, security, consensus, and applicationsApplied cryptography: classical and post-quantum solutionsDecentralized AI: security, privacy, and incentive mechanisms Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all.
